title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Use ForeFlight Mobile with MSFS 2020
description:
In this video we will look at how you can connect ForeFlight Mobile to MSFS 2020 using two freeware solutions: Flight Events and FS2FF. I will show you how where you can download the tools, install them and configure them for use with ForeFlight mobile. After installing and configuring the tools we will start start MSFS 2020 and connect ForeFlight mobile to MSFS 2020. I will show you how to plan your basic flight using ForeFlight and demo some of the cool features which are part of ForeFlight.

Below you will find download links for the freeware solutions used in this video:

Flight Events:
https://events.flighttracker.tech/

FS2FF
https://github.com/astenlund/fs2ff/releases/tag/v0.1.13

ForeFlight itself can be used 30 days using a trail subscription which contains a subset of the functions. After the 30 days you will need to buy a subscription. More information about ForeFlight can be found on the site below:

https://www.foreflight.com
